offers_list.unpaid_calls_alert: Cannot initiate new interpretation call because some of your previous calls are unpaid. Navigate to «My Calls» section to see the details.

info_popup.step2: — Interpreters ready to accept your call will be displayed on this page
info_popup.step4: — Explain your requirements and call details to the interpreter.
info_popup.step5: — Dial the phone number, wait for the answer and continue your conversation as a group conference call.
info_popup.step6: — The interpreter can hear and interpret your conversation in both directions.

step7.after_button: under the dialed phone number to remove this phone number from the conference. The interpreter will stay in touch.

step8.after_button: to end the conversation with the interpreter.

info_popup.step9: — Your balance will be automatically charged for the payment amount. A phone call is free and the payment amount is based entirely on the selected interpreter's fee.
